snippet: Prime Minister Victor Ponta was named last week as a suspect in a criminal investigation that includes money laundering and being an accomplice to tax evasion.
abstract: Romania's Parliament voted 231 to 120 not to lift immunity of Prime Min Victor Ponta, suspect in criminal investigation which includes money laundering and aiding tax evasion; Ponta denies charges and refuses urging by Romania's Pres Klaus Iohannis to resign.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Victor Ponta was named last week as a suspect in a criminal investigation that includes money laundering and being an accomplice to tax evasion.
